subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rajon Rondo scored 23 points in the first three quarters Monday as Boston opened a 30-point lead and coasted to a 104-87 victory against the visiting Phoenix Suns.
snippet: Rajon Rondo scored 23 points in the first three quarters Monday as Boston opened a 30-point lead and coasted to a 104-87 victory against the visiting Phoenix Suns.
